description: Variation of condition 1 and removal of condition 7 of planning permission dated 27th August 2021 (RN: 21/04376/FULL) which in itself varies conditions 1 and 15 of planning permission dated 12 March 2021 (RN: 21/00308/FULL) for the: Installation of a new brick facade with double-height retail window at street level on New Bond Street, extension of the first floor to form an extended retail unit, erection of a new build extension to the rear of the building at Haunch of Venison Yard, (all for use within Use Class E), a new private roof terrace at second floor, new plant equipment at roof level, enclosure and associated works, to allow set back office entrance door from main Haunch of Venison Yard elevation; external set back added behind lift shaft; replacement of door with window at second floor roof terrace; replacement of green wall with balustrading; revision of stair overrun position; addition of safety balustrade at fourth floor (set back from main New Bond Street elevation); adjustment to position of door to louvred plant screen; and provision of external door to Haunch of Venison Yard stair overrun (for maintenance access only).
